org.spongepowered.api.event.block.tile

Interface FurnaceSmeltItemEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, BlockInventoryEvent, Cancellable, CauseTracked, Event, FurnaceEvent, GameEvent, InventoryEvent, ItemResultEvent, TileEntityEvent

    public interface FurnaceSmeltItemEvent
extends FurnaceEvent, ItemResultEvent, Cancellable
    An event that occurs when a Furnace smelt an item.

    • Method Detail

      • getCookedItem

        ItemStack getCookedItem()
        Gets the freshly cooked ItemStack.

        A Furnace cooks ItemStacks with fuel and produces new items.

        Returns:
        The cooked item

      • setCookedItem

        void setCookedItem(ItemStack item)
        Sets the cooked ItemStack.

        A Furnace cooks ItemStacks with fuel and produces new items.

        Parameters:
        item - The resulting cooked item
